error.message: Missing explicit access check on entity query.
Call to deprecated function GuzzleHttp\Psr7\parse_query(): parse_query will be removed in guzzlehttp/psr7:2.0. Use Query::parse instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
